dialogue.text: Welcome Dumbass, glad you could make it!
Like the name? Hope you're mad!
I should introduce myself. Call me...

I helped program this game for a bit, 
and noticed that a little anti piracy  
screen got pushed to the repo.
Anyways, here's how it's gonna work:

We're gonna play a song. 
Beat my best score, 
and you can get on with your game.

Let's just say you'll be 
hearing sirens REAL soon.
